definitions.definition: To look at or watch with a strong desire , especially of a sexual nature.
labels: usually in the phrase lust after
definitions.label_groups: intransitive , usually in the phrase lust after
archaic ; transitive or intransitive with after , for , to , etc.; formerly also reflexive

main_definition: ( intransitive , usually in the phrase lust after ) To look at or watch with a strong desire , especially of a sexual nature.
secondary_definitions: ( archaic ; transitive or intransitive with after , for , to , etc.; formerly also reflexive ) To desire .
